item.name: key
item.desc: As you look at the key, it is rather shiny and can be used for any generic door.

item.name: skeleton key
item.desc: This Key is unlike any other, it appears to have a skull on it and will only work with one door.

item.name: lamp
item.desc: This is a lamp, if used with fuel and a match, will light up the Cave.

item.name: match
item.desc: This is a match. If used with fuel and a lamp, it will light up the cave.

item.name: fuel
item.desc: This fuel, when used with a lamp and a match, will light up the cave.

item.name: relic
item.desc: This relic mesmorizes you... It has five words on it. "You just lost the game."
